name: Standard Cocoa
tag_list: ecommerce, chocolate, subscription, curated, craft, artisanal
overview:
Standard Cocoa is a craft chocolate subscription service.

Its mission is to connect chocolate lovers with people who love to make chocolate. Every month subscribers receive unique bars of curated chocolate from a featured craft chocolate maker. Standard Cocoa focuses on sharing each chocolate makerâ€™s individual story, thereby strengthening the connection between producer and consumer of the chocolate.

Standard Cocoa was inspired by a love and appreciation for craft chocolate. Its co-founders believe that consumers appreciate products produced in high quality, hand-crafted micro-batches. After months of consumer research, they discovered that the story behind the product has also become as essential as the product itself. Following a shared passion for chocolate and e-commerce, Standard Cocoa was born.
